DOC.brief_summary: To explore feasibility different dos etomidate admixed propofol induce abortion : randomize , double blind control trial .
DOC.brief_title: The Feasibility Different Doses Etomidate Admixed With Propofol Induced Abortion : A Randomized , Double Blind Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Aged 20 35 year American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) Physical Status : Ⅰ Ⅱ Singleton pregnancy gestational period 6 8 week Expected operation duration within 60 minute The body weight within 15 % around standard weight Signed informed consent form Serious cardiac , cerebral , liver , kidney , lung , endocrine disease Upper respiratory infection within 4 week Long use hormone history adrenal suppression History use glucocorticoid , aprotinin immunosuppressant Manifestation immunodeficiency History use sedatives opiate Needs Neuromuscular blocker ( except intubation ) Allergy trial drug contraindication Pregnant breastfeed woman Attended trial past 30 day
